verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: Qaf. By the Glorious Quran.

verses.verseString: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَنْ جَاءَهُمْ مُنْذِرٌ مِنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.verseStringB: They marveled that a warner has come to them from among them. The disbelievers say, “This is something strange.

verses.verseString: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: When we have died and become dust? This is a farfetched return.”

verses.verseString: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنْقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِنْدَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
verses.verseStringB: We know what the earth consumes of them, and with Us is a comprehensive book.

verses.verseString: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَرِيجٍ
verses.verseStringB: But they denied the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a state of confusion.

verses.verseString: أَفَلَمْ يَنْظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِنْ فُرُوجٍ
verses.verseStringB: Have they not observed the sky above them: how We constructed it and decorated it, and it has no cracks?

verses.verseString: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنْبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِنْ كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
verses.verseStringB: And the earth, how We spread it out, and We set mountains on it, and We made every beautiful pair grow in it?

verses.verseString: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُنِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: An observation and a reminder for every repenting worshiper.

verses.verseString: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُبَارَكًا فَأَنْبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: And We sent down from the sky blessed water, and We grew with it gardens and grains for harvest.

verses.verseString: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَهَا طَلْعٌ نَضِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And the soaring palms, with layered clusters.

verses.verseString: رِزْقًا لِلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
verses.verseStringB: As sustenance for the servants. And We revive with it a dead land. Likewise is the emergence.

verses.verseString: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.verseStringB: Before them, the people of Noah denied, as did the dwellers of Russ, and Thamood.

verses.verseString: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
verses.verseStringB: And Aad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot.

verses.verseString: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: And the Woods-Dwellers, and the people of Tubba. They all rejected the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

verses.verseString: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: Were We fatigued by the first creation? But they are in doubt about a new creation.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: We created the human being, and We know what his soul whispers to him. We are closer to him than his jugular vein.

verses.verseString: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: As the two receivers receive, seated to the right and to the left.

verses.verseString: مَا يَلْفِظُ مِنْ قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: Not a word does he utter, without an observer beside him ready.

verses.verseString: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنْتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.verseStringB: And the daze of death has come in truth: “This is what you were trying to evade.”

verses.verseString: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: And the Trumpet is blown: “This is the Promised Day.”

verses.verseString: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And every soul comes, with it a driver and a witness.

verses.verseString: لَقَدْ كُنْتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِنْ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنْكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: “You were negligent of this, so We lifted your screen from you, and your vision today is sharp.”

verses.verseString: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: And His escort will say, “This is what I have ready.”

verses.verseString: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: “Throw into Hell every stubborn disbeliever.

verses.verseString: مَنَّاعٍ لِلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُرِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: Preventer of good, aggressor, doubter.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: Who fabricated another god with Allah; so toss him into the intense agony.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَٰكِنْ كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: His escort will say, “Our Lord, I did not make him rebel, but he was far astray.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُمْ بِالْوَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: He will say, “Do not feud in My presence—I have warned you in advance.

verses.verseString: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِلْعَبِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: The word will not be changed with Me, and I am not unjust to the servants.”

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِنْ مَزِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when We say to Hell, “Are you full?” And it says, “Are there any more?”

verses.verseString: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.verseStringB: And Paradise will be brought near for the righteous—not far away.

verses.verseString: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.verseStringB: “This is what you were promised—for every careful penitent.

verses.verseString: مَنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُنِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: Who inwardly feared the Compassionate, and came with a repentant heart.

verses.verseString: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
verses.verseStringB: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity.”

verses.verseString: لَهُمْ مَا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: In it, they will have whatever they desire—and with Us is even more.

verses.verseString: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُمْ مِنْ قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُمْ بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِنْ مَحِيصٍ
verses.verseStringB: How many generations before them did We destroy, who were more powerful than they? They explored the lands—was there any escape?

verses.verseString: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَنْ كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: In this is a reminder for whoever possesses a heart, or cares to listen and witness.

verses.verseString: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِنْ لُغُوبٍ
verses.verseStringB: We created the heavens and the earth and everything between them in six stages, and no fatigue touched Us.

verses.verseString: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
verses.verseStringB: So endure what they say, and proclaim the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun, and before sunset.

verses.verseString: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
verses.verseStringB: And glorify Him during the night, and after the prostrations.

verses.verseString: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِنْ مَكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.verseStringB: And listen for the Day when the Caller calls from a nearby place.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when they hear the Shout in Truth. This is the Day of Emergence.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
verses.verseStringB: It is We Who give life and cause death. And to Us, is the destination.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.verseStringB: The Day when the earth breaks open from them quickly. That is an easy gathering for Us.

verses.verseString: نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَنْ يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: We are fully aware of what they say, and you are not a dictator over them. So remind with the Quran whoever fears My warning.
